===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=はってんとじょうこく|発展|tr1=hatten|t1=development, growth|途上|tr2=tojō|t2=partway, in the process of|国|tr3=koku|t3=country}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|n|は|ってんとじょ|うこく}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ha̠tːẽ̞n to̞d͡ʑʲo̞ː ko̞kɯᵝ]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|はってん とじょう こく}}

# [[developing country]], [[emerging]] [[economy]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|途上国|とじょう こく}} {{qualifier|abbreviation of ''{{lang|ja|発展途上国}}}}
* {{ja-r|開発途上国|かいはつ とじょう こく}} {{qualifier|less common}}
* {{ja-r|低開発国|てい かいはつ こく}} {{qualifier|literally, ''“low-development country”}}
* {{ja-r|後進国|こうしん こく}} {{qualifier|less common; literally, ''“backward country”}}

====Related terms====
